tasks.task: Analyze the challenges and needs of small and marginal Indian farmers
subtasks: Recognize the prevalence of small landholdings among Indian farmers
Identify the importance of extension services for farmers
Highlight the need for real-time market, credit, seed, and fertilizer information
Emphasize the significance of post-harvest supply chain management
Discuss the importance of technology and innovation in increasing productivity and nutritional value
Address the challenge of water conservation in agriculture
Mention the successful partnership with Mojic fertilizer for field demonstrations
Explain the integrated soil and crop recommendation system
Highlight the benefits of soil testing and package of practices for farmers
Address the youth's perception of agriculture and its challenges in India
Advocate for sensibilizing youth towards agriculture and its importance in the country
